title: Home - Netlink
paragraphs: Transform your business with our specialized technology and solutions!
Digital transformation powered with the latest up-trending technology solutions to deliver faster enterprise applications
A unique self-service business intelligence platform with multi-dimensional analytics that too without any coding
Along with the traditional POD model, we also offer state-of-the-art IT engagement model that delivers role/skill-based IT services at predictable costs
Easy to use ERP solutions in the areas of Manufacturing, Finance, Sales, CRM, Inventory, Reporting, and many more to manage your unique business efficiently
Specialized IoT and RPA technology services to automate manual processes for organizations of any size across any industry
Empowering developers to become productive experts in just a few weeks. From tech skills to certifications, we complete their journey
Eliminate human dependencies and increase productivity with our Robotics Process Automation (RPA), irrespective of the size of your organization
Our happy employees create delighted customers. With perfect work-fun balance, they find Netlink as perfect place to work

At Netlink, our technology experts have been delivering customer-centric solutions for over two decades “that are usable and simplified”. With technology at core and customers in our heart, we believe in innovating, transforming, accelerating, and redefining businesses
Netlink with its global footprints is one of the fastest-growing companies in its domain
Its partnerships with companies like Oracle, SAP, Microsoft, Vertica, etc, and its expertise in Industry 4.0 solutions, addresses both the current and future IT needs of its customers

Netlink ensures the utmost quality in its processes and solutions offered. And with CMMI, SOC2, ISO, CISA, SSAE, ITIL, and several other certifications, it puts compliance at the center stage in all its activities
We help organizations to attain a competitive edge using state-of-the-art technology solutions
We work closely with your team to better understand your business
We strive to be a long-term trusted partner with a co-investment mindset
Agility and adaptability are the cornerstones of our product
We continually look for opportunities to accelerate growth and overall business efficiency so you’re always ahead of the curve
We nurture an environment that encourages ambition, creativity, and recognition to develop and retain the best workforce for our business
With the trust and patronage of hundreds of multinationals, corporates, government and private organizations worldwide, Netlink has emerged as the partner of their choice
Contact us to transform your business with the power of technology and expertise of Netlink
